app.name: Tawtheeq
app.description: Tawtheeq is a modern, free, and open-source documentation platform designed to empower developers and teams to create, organize, and share beautiful documentation with ease. We focus on providing a user-friendly, collaborative, and powerful documentation experience, making Tawtheeq the ideal choice for projects of all sizes.

introduction.title: ðŸ“š Welcome to Tawtheeq
introduction.description: Tawtheeq is a modern, free, and open-source documentation platform designed to empower developers and teams to create, organize, and share beautiful documentation with ease. We focus on providing a user-friendly, collaborative, and powerful documentation experience, making Tawtheeq the ideal choice for projects of all sizes.

whatIs.title: What is Tawtheeq?
whatIs.description: Tawtheeq is an open-source documentation platform that transforms the way teams create and maintain documentation. Built with modern technologies and designed for collaboration, it offers a seamless experience for writing, organizing, and sharing knowledge across teams and communities.

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.description: Get started with Tawtheeq in minutes. Create your first documentation project and start writing beautiful docs with markdown support, collaborative editing, and real-time preview.

codeExample.title: # Getting Started with Tawtheeq
codeExample.description: This is your first documentation page.
codeExample.markdown: You can write in markdown and see

quickStart.availableAt: Your documentation site will be available at

coreFeatures.title: Core Features
coreFeatures.description: Tawtheeq is packed with features that make documentation creation and maintenance a breeze for individuals and teams.

markdown.title: Rich Markdown Support
markdown.description: Write documentation using extended Markdown with support for tables, code blocks, math equations, diagrams, and custom components for enhanced content creation.

collaboration.title: Real-time Collaboration
collaboration.description: Collaborate with your team in real-time with live editing, comments, suggestions, and version control integration to streamline your documentation workflow.

themes.title: Beautiful Themes
themes.description: Choose from a variety of professionally designed themes or create your own. Customize colors, fonts, and layouts to match your brand and style preferences.

search.title: Powerful Search
search.description: Built-in full-text search with advanced filters, tagging system, and AI-powered content discovery to help users find information quickly and efficiently.

deployment.title: Easy Deployment
deployment.description: Deploy your documentation to popular hosting platforms with one click. Support for GitHub Pages, Netlify, Vercel, and custom domains with SSL certificates.

integrations.title: Rich Integrations
integrations.description: Connect with your favorite tools including GitHub, GitLab, Slack, Discord, and more. Sync content, get notifications, and maintain consistency across platforms.

contributing.title: Contributing
contributing.description: Tawtheeq is an open-source project and we welcome contributions from the community. Whether it's reporting a bug, suggesting a feature, improving documentation, or writing code, your help makes Tawtheeq better for everyone. Join our community and help us build the future of documentation.
